sourcesContent:
"use client"; import React from "react"; export const AnnouncementCard = ({ uuid, date, title, category, status, // status dikirim dari parent onDetail, onUpdate, onDelete, description, is }) => { return (
{/* Baris tanggal dan status */}
{date}
{status?.label || ""}
{/* Judul dan tombol */}

{title}

{/* Kategori */}
Kategori : {category}
); };
